title: Place a Purchase Order
description: An item's inventory has fallen below its reorder point. A buyer needs to place a purchase order with the supplier.

tasks.description: Receive a system alert that an item is below its reorder point.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the need to reorder.

tasks.description: Determine the optimal order quantity based on lead time, demand, and economic order quantity (EOQ).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system suggests an order quantity of 1,000 units.

tasks.description: Create a purchase order for the suggested quantity and send it to the approved supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and sends the PO.
